thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 20 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Monnari Trade Offers To Buy Gino Rossi's Simple Creative Products

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Monnari Trade Offers To Buy Gino Rossi's Simple Creative Products
text:
Feb 20 (Reuters) - GINO ROSSI SA
* SAID ON MONDAY THE COMPANY RECEIVED FROM MONNARI TRADE SA AN INITIAL PROPOSAL TO ACQUIRE 100 PERCENT OF STAKE IN SIMPLE CREATIVE PRODUCTS SA
* TOTAL AMOUNT OF THE DEAL BETWEEN 46.0 MILLION ZLOTYS AND 50.5 MILLION ZLOTYS
* GINO ROSSI TO GRANT MONNARI TRADE CONSENT FOR EXCLUSIVE NEGOTIATIONS UNTIL FEB 23
* THE TALKS ARE EXPECTED TO CONCLUDE BY APRIL 30 Source text for Eikon:
Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
